channel.title: Rollback
channel.description: Earlier today a new user decided to go on a nice little griefing spree and destroy a large amount of work done by reyx7 in creative. I've rolled back everything I can but because he used lava I can't fix quite a large portion of the damage he did. Is there a way to rollback lava/fire damage with core inspect?

item.title: Rollback
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

That seemed to fix it, thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Rollback
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Yes, and I’m saying stand near and do a rollback for EVERYTHING in the last X hours and X radius without specifying a user name at all. Don’t make the radius too big.

Read full topic

item.title: Rollback
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

The command I used was /co rollback u:iMine4Fun98 t:24h

If you don’t specify the radius it rolls back all damage done within the time specified, but a large portion of lava remains and all of the wood burnt by lava didn’t roll back.

Read full topic

item.title: Rollback
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Did you try standing there and doing a full radius rollback?

Read full topic
